name: The Milky Way
description:
You are running low on fuel and must make contact with a foreign planet to collect fuel, but the locals aren't happy!

Controls:
- LMB: Drop cow bomb
- LMB + RMB: Aim + Shoot
- Space: Use tractor beam

Ludum Dare: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/the-milky-way
